item.title: Minister promises necessary funds for widening roads in Raichur district of Karnataka
item.description:
<![CDATA[Public Works Department Minister Satish Jarkiholi has promised release of necessary grants for widening roads in Raichur district in Karnataka.
Chairing a review meeting in Raichur on June 16, Mr. Jarkiholi said that development of an area depends on the condition of roads and good connectivity. Officers should ensure proper maintenance of district, taluk and hobli level roads, and improve connectivity, he advised.
